name: Shiftry
author: Kouki Saitou
flavor_text: A Pokémon that was feared as a forest guardian. It can read the foe’s mind and take preemptive action.

abilities.name: Leaf Draw
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a {G} Energy card from your hand. If you do, draw 3 cards.

attacks.name: Deranged Dance
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage times the number of Benched Pokémon (both yours and your opponent’s).
